words.defineEn: to move in a circular direction around a fixed line or point
words.defineVi: di chuyển theo hướng tròn xung quanh một đường hoặc điểm cố định

examples: Under stress, the body produces adrenalin.
The flowers bloomed under the sunny sky.
The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
Lots of people had left comments under the post.
A reporter obtained documents from the company under false pretenses.
words.defineEn: in, to, or through a position that is below something
words.defineVi: trong, đến hoặc thông qua một vị trí bên dưới một cái gì đó

examples: The California vineyards produce excellent wines.
This vineyard yields high-quality grapes that are used to produce exceptional wines.
And a year later, he bought a 210-acre vineyard in the south of France.
It's full of gardens, groves, and vineyards.
Champagne production dates back to the third century, when the Romans first planted vineyards in northeastern France.
words.defineEn: a piece of land on which grapes are grown to make wine
words.defineVi: một mảnh đất trên đó nho được trồng để làm rượu vang

examples: The plan ran into a brick wall.
Small cracks appeared in the wall.
She decorated the walls of her bedroom with pictures and posters.
He's bouncing off the walls.
The artwork on the wall was a mix of colors and textures.
words.defineEn: an upright structure, usually made of brick, concrete, or stone that is made to divide, protect, or surround a place
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc thẳng đứng, thường được làm bằng gạch, bê tông hoặc đá được tạo ra để phân chia, bảo vệ hoặc bao quanh một nơi

examples: The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
The fall knocked the wind out of me.
The president has the wind at his back on this issue.
At last the wind dropped.
The wind has changed direction.
words.defineEn: air that moves quickly or strongly in a current as a result of natural forces
words.defineVi: không khí di chuyển nhanh hoặc mạnh theo dòng chảy do tác động của các lực tự nhiên

examples: Wonders never cease!
Wonders never cease!
Will wonders ever cease?
Would wonders ever cease?
Would wonders never cease?!
words.defineEn: to want to know about something particular
words.defineVi: muốn biết về một cái gì đó cụ thể

examples: The center will serve the whole community.
They drove a flock of sheep through the center of the city.
The bus station is located in the city center.
He lives far from the city center.
The hollow center of rigatoni allows it to hold robust sauces and fillings.
words.defineEn: a commercial building or complex with multiple retail stores, businesses, and entertainment options for public consumption
words.defineVi: một tòa nhà thương mại hoặc khu phức hợp với nhiều cửa hàng bán lẻ, doanh nghiệp và các lựa chọn giải trí cho tiêu dùng công cộng
